p:
To validate the mechanical stability of tetragonal-TlGaTe 2, we calculated the single-crystal elastic constant tensor using the finite strain technique. This structure has six independent elastic constants namely C 11 = 32.205, C 12 = 15.894, C 13 = 11.959, C 33 = 58.188, C 44 = 10.237 , and C 66 = 12.009. The mechanical stability criteria for the tetragonal (type I) phase are given by [ 27]: C 11 − C 12 > 0 (1)
2(C 11 + C 12) + C 33 + 4C 13 > 0 (2)
C 44 > 0, C 66 > 0 (3)
C 11 + C 12 − 2C 13 > 0 (4)
